Name: Eldritch Rebirth
Story Background: Deep within the ancient forest, the primal forces of nature coalesce to bring about a profound rebirth, rejuvenating the land and calling forth new life from the earth.
Ability: Eldritch Rebirth allows you to return all creature cards with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If Eldritch Rebirth was cast from your graveyard, you may return all creature cards with converted mana cost 4 or greater from your graveyard to the battlefield instead.
Appearance Description: The card art depicts a mystical forest teeming with vibrant energy, as ancient trees release their life force, prompting diverse creatures to emerge from the earth and bask in the glow of renewal.
